L

labelize(String) - Static method in class be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.model.ArticleLabelizer
Use the bag of word method to construct an histogram of occurence of word from the bag of words from the article content Use the cosine similarity (check the theory behind it : https://towardsdatascience.com/overview-of-text-similarity-metrics-3397c4601f50) to assign a score for each category (the most probable category based on the article content), then it tags the article with that category
labelizeArticle(String) - Static method in class be.ac.ulb.infof307.g04.model.ArticleLabelizer
Constructor that construct the bag containing the words from the wordlists, and construct the histogram associated with each category
